types.name: Query
types.description: The query root of this schema. See available queries.

fields.name: root
fields.description: Root object to get viewer related collections

types.name: Viewer
types.description: Support unassociated root queries that fetches collections. Supports fetching posts and users collection

fields.name: current_user
fields.description: Returns current signed in user object

fields.name: posts
fields.description: Post connection to fetch paginated posts collection.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: List of tags for the post

types.name: Post
types.description: A single post entry returns a post with author, total votes and comments

fields.name: body
fields.description: The body of this post

fields.name: comments
fields.description: All comments association with this post. Returns comments collection and accepts arguments.

fields.name: comments_count
fields.description: The total numner of comments on this post

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: The time at which this post was created

fields.name: excerpt
fields.description: The short description of this post

fields.name: slug
fields.description: The slug of this post

fields.name: tags
fields.description: List of tags for the post

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of this post

fields.name: user
fields.description: Owner of this post

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: The id of this post author

fields.name: voted
fields.description: Is this post voted by current user?

fields.name: votes_count
fields.description: The total numner of votes on this post

types.name: User
types.description: An user entry, returns basic user information

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: The date this user created an account

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email of this user

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of this user

types.name: Comment
types.description: A single comment entry returns a comment with author and total votes

fields.name: body
fields.description: The body of this comment

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: The date on which the comment was posted

fields.name: is_owner
fields.description: Is the comment belongs to current user?

fields.name: user
fields.description: Owner of this comment

fields.name: voted
fields.description: Is this comment voted by current user?

fields.name: votes_count
fields.description: The total number of votes on this comment

fields.name: directives
fields.description: Directives in this schema

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: The mutation root of this schema

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The query root of this schema

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: The subscription root of this schema

fields.name: types
fields.description: Types in this schema

types.name: __Type
types.description: A type in the GraphQL schema

fields.name: description
fields.description: What this type represents

fields.name: enumValues
fields.description: Values for this enum

fields.name: fields
fields.description: List of fields on this object

fields.name: inputFields
fields.description: fields on this input object

fields.name: interfaces
fields.description: Interfaces which this object implements

fields.name: kind
fields.description: The kind of this type

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of this type

fields.name: ofType
fields.description: The modified type of this type

fields.name: possibleTypes
fields.description: Types which compose this Union or Interface

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: The kinds of types in this GraphQL system

fields.name: args
fields.description: Arguments allowed to this object

fields.name: deprecationReason
fields.description: Why this field was deprecated

fields.name: description
fields.description: The description of this field

fields.name: isDeprecated
fields.description: Is this field deprecated?

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for accessing this field

fields.name: type
fields.description: The return type of this field

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: An input for a field or InputObject

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: The value applied if no other value is provided

fields.name: description
fields.description: What this value is used for

fields.name: name
fields.description: The key for this value

fields.name: type
fields.description: The expected type for this value

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: A possible value for an Enum

types.name: __Directive
types.description: A query directive in this schema

fields.name: args
fields.description: Arguments allowed to this object

fields.name: description
fields.description: The description for this type

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of this directive

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: Parts of the query where a directive may be located

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Ignore this part of the query if `if` is true

directives.name: include
directives.description: Include this part of the query if `if` is true
